title: World Famous Matzo Balls
ingredients: ['4 large eggs', '100g (4 oz) matzo meal', '4 tablespoons vegetable oil', '1 tablespoon chicken stock', '1 tablespoon vodka', '1 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon white pepper', '1/2 teaspoon dried basil', '100 ml (4 fl oz) soda water', '2L (3 1/4 pints) chicken stock']
